heading: 1 About
text: example documentation -text citations reference styles used TWRI reports.

heading: 1.1.1 In-Text References
text: One author: name year (Smith 2008)Two authors: name name year (Smith Jones 2009)Three authors: name et al. year (Smith et al. 2010)

heading: 1.1.2 End References
text: End references follow Chicago Manual Style, examples available : http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/tools_citationguide/citation-guide-2.html#cg-journal.General Rules:Authors: List 10 authors reference list. 10 authors, list first seven et al. end, e.g., Lennon, McCartney, Harrison, Starr, Clapton, Hendrix, Joplin, et al. Journal article report titles: exception CMOS, use sentence case, title case. use quotation marks around article titles.Journal names: exception CMOS, italicize journal names.Dates: date, use n.d. year.

heading: 1.2 Bibliography Managers
text: multiple bibliography managers available manage format references. Zotero Mendeley use Citation Style Language (.csl) files format references. .csl file specific TWRI’s -house reference style available Github.

heading: 2 Reports
text: Last Name, First Name initial, Last Name, First Name Initial. Year. Report title Title Case, Publisher/Organization. Identifying information. URL.

heading: 2.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (Borel et al. 2012).Borel et al. (2012) vitae aliquet nec ullamcorper sit amet risus nullam eget

heading: 3 Journals
text: Last name, First initial Middle initial. Year. Article title sentence case. Journal Title. Volume (issue): page numbers. URL (use DOI possible).

heading: 3.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (K. L. Wagner et al. 2012). Byers et al. (2005) mattis vulputate enim nulla aliquet porttitor lacus.

heading: 4 News and Magazine Articles
text: Last name, First name. Year. Title sentence case. Newspaper/Magazine, Date published. URL.

heading: 4.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (Schlanger 2018).

heading: 5 Websites
text: Name/organization. Year. Website title Title Case. URL.

heading: 6.1 Complete Books
text: Name/organization. Year. Website title Title Case. URL.

heading: 6.2 Chapter or parts of books
text: Last name, First initial Middle initial. Year. Title chapter/section sentence case. Title book Title Case, edited First initial Middle initial Last name First initial Middle initial Last name, pages. Publisher information. URL.

heading: 6.3 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (James et al. 2013). Helsel et al. (2020) mauris cursus mattis molestie iaculis .Tempus urna et pharetra pharetra massa. Arcu cursus euismod quis viverra. Id interdum velit laoreet id donec (Grant et al. 2013).
